cookieConsent.title: We Use Cookies üç™
cookieConsent.description: We use essential cookies for site functionality and analytics cookies to improve your experience.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.intro: Your privacy is important to us. This policy explains how we collect, use, and protect your personal data.

dataCollection.title: 1. Data We Collect
dataCollection.content: We collect information when you register, including name, email, profile photo (via Google OAuth), location (if authorized), and site usage data.

dataUsage.title: 2. How We Use Your Data
dataUsage.content: We use your data to: provide and improve our services, personalize your experience, send event notifications, analyze site usage (Google Analytics), and comply with legal obligations.

dataSharing.title: 3. Data Sharing
dataSharing.content: We do not sell your data. We share information only with: Google (authentication and analytics), Backblaze B2 (image storage), and when required by law.

dataRetention.title: 4. Data Retention
dataRetention.content: We keep your data while your account is active. You can request account deletion at any time.

rights.title: 5. Your Rights (GDPR)
rights.content: You have the right to: access your data, rectify incorrect information, delete your account, export your data, and withdraw previously given consents.

cookies.title: 6. Cookies
cookies.content: We use essential cookies (authentication, preferences) and analytics cookies (Google Analytics). You can manage your cookie preferences in settings.

security.title: 7. Security
security.content: We implement technical and organizational measures to protect your data against unauthorized access, loss, or destruction.

children.title: 8. Minors
children.content: Our services are not intended for individuals under 16 years old. If we discover we have collected data from a minor, we will delete it immediately.

changes.title: 9. Policy Changes
changes.content: We may update this policy occasionally. We will notify you of significant changes.

contact.title: 10. Contact
contact.content: For privacy questions, contact us through the contact page.

terms.title: Terms of Service
terms.intro: By using Athlifyr, you agree to these terms. Please read them carefully.

acceptance.title: 1. Acceptance of Terms
acceptance.content: By accessing and using Athlifyr, you agree to be bound by these Terms of Service and our Privacy Policy.

description.title: 2. Service Description
description.content: Athlifyr is a platform that aggregates information about sports events. We provide links to official event pages but do not organize or are responsible for the listed events.

account.title: 3. User Account
account.content: You must be at least 16 years old to create an account. You are responsible for maintaining your account security and all activities performed with it.

userContent.title: 4. User Content
userContent.content: By posting content (photos, comments), you guarantee you have the necessary rights. You grant us a license to use, display, and distribute that content on the platform.

prohibited.title: 5. Prohibited Use
prohibited.content: Prohibited: posting offensive, illegal content or content that violates third-party rights; using the service for spam or malicious activities; attempting to access restricted system areas.

intellectual.title: 6. Intellectual Property
intellectual.content: All Athlifyr content (design, code, brand) is owned by us or our licensors. You may not copy or reproduce without authorization.

disclaimer.title: 7. Disclaimer
disclaimer.content: The service is provided 'as is'. We do not guarantee the accuracy of event information. We are not responsible for cancellations, changes, or issues with listed events.

limitation.title: 8. Limitation of Liability
limitation.content: We will not be liable for indirect, incidental, or consequential damages resulting from use of the service.

termination.title: 9. Suspension and Deletion
termination.content: We reserve the right to suspend or delete accounts that violate these terms, without prior notice.

changes.title: 10. Changes to Terms
changes.content: We may modify these terms at any time. Continued use after changes constitutes acceptance of the new terms.

law.title: 11. Applicable Law
law.content: These terms are governed by the laws of Portugal. Any dispute will be resolved in Portuguese courts.

contact.title: 12. Contact
contact.content: For questions about these terms, contact us through the contact page.

cookies.title: Cookie Policy
cookies.intro: We use cookies to improve your experience on Athlifyr. This page explains what cookies are and how we use them.

whatAre.title: What are Cookies?
whatAre.content: Cookies are small text files stored on your device when you visit a website. They allow the site to recognize you and remember your preferences.

essential.title: Essential Cookies (Required)
essential.description: Necessary for basic site functionality. Without these, the site does not work properly.
essential.examples: Authentication (login session), language preferences, cookie consent.

analytics.title: Analytics Cookies (Optional)
analytics.description: Help us understand how visitors use the site to improve the experience.
analytics.examples: Google Analytics: pages visited, time on site, traffic source.

functional.title: Functional Cookies (Optional)
functional.examples: Event filter preferences, saved location, favorite sports.

thirdParty.title: Third-Party Cookies
thirdParty.content: We use Google Analytics, which places cookies on your device. Learn more in Google's privacy policy.

manage.title: How to Manage Cookies
manage.content: You can accept or reject non-essential cookies through our cookie banner. You can also configure your browser to block cookies, but this may affect site functionality.

duration.title: Cookie Duration
duration.session: Session Cookies: expire when you close your browser
duration.persistent: Persistent Cookies: remain on your device for a defined period (up to 365 days)

updates.title: Updates
updates.content: We may update this policy periodically. Check this page regularly to stay informed.
